Welcome to Tutor Time Admin Panel!

Tutor Time is an innovative platform that connects students with qualified tutors for personalized learning experiences. Our mission is to make quality education accessible to everyone.

As an Admin, you have the authority to:

1. Manage Tutor and Student Accounts – Approve, reject, and update profiles.

2. Monitor Bookings and Sessions – View all tutoring sessions and resolve issues.

3. Manage Payments – Oversee tutor payments and student transactions.

4. Post Announcements – Share important updates, news, and policy changes.

5. Support and Feedback – Handle user complaints and feedback.

Contact Us:

Email: admin@tutortime.com
Phone: +1-987-654-3210
Website: www.tutortime.com

Thank you for helping us maintain a safe and effective learning environment!
